name: Verbal Fusion
tag_list: transcription-services, transcription, dictation, proofreading-services, editing-services, editing, note-taking, verbalfusion
overview: Verbal Fusion offers acclaimed, 100% U.S.-based transcription services, note-taking services, proofreading services, editing services, and copywriting services with simple, affordable pricing. If you are in need of cogent and compelling writing products, Verbal Fusion can bring your words together, so you can bring your ideas to life. Let us help you capture your message today, so you can capture your target audience tomorrow.

milestones.description: Verbal Fusion provides transcription services for countless clients worldwide. Recognizing an increased need for both same-day delivery and virtual note takers sparked the idea for the company’s new service, Same-Day Notes, which launched earlier this fal
milestones.source_description: Verbal Fusion Transcription Services Launches Same-Day Notes, an Instant Note-Taking Solution for Live and Pre-Recorded Audio
